data.name: Velocity VR Battle Royale
data.detailed_description:
Shoot Slice Climb Hit Demolish
In Velocity you appear on an island, wake up and find your self in my simulation ready to survive and log out before the server crashes. Only way to leave is to win or die trying.

Immerse your self with Physics


Destroy anything in your path


Climb anything to get the advantage


Real feeling reloads


Main Game Features

*Physic Based Interaction
*Destruction
*Real Gun Loading System
*Climb anything
data.about_the_game:
Shoot Slice Climb Hit Demolish
In Velocity you appear on an island, wake up and find your self in my simulation ready to survive and log out before the server crashes. Only way to leave is to win or die trying.

Immerse your self with Physics


Destroy anything in your path

Main Game Features

*Climb anything
data.short_description: Spawn into my simulation, fight for your life until one remains. Destroy everything in your path, slice all in your way, climb into action, and punch out the competition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Velocity is like most shooters this game contains guns and explosives to kill other entities. Velocity is a Battle Royal be the last man standing aka kill everyone and avoid the circle closing in on the Map.
